comment:
Administer:To give a vaccine or medication to a patient through a specific route, such as orally (pill) or through injection (shot).
Thoroughly studied:Refers to the level of research and testing conducted on a vaccine to ensure its safety and effectiveness before it is approved for public use.
Maximize:To make as large or great as possible, in this context, to vaccinate as many patients as efficiently as possible within the given time constraint.
